name: Domain of Mastery: Realm of Slumber
description:
Massive Cryo energy is coursing through this freezing ancient sacrificial altar.
The bone-piercing cold even makes traversal difficult.
You shall earn Talent level-up materials, if — and only if — you can pass the trial.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Mastery: Realm of Slumber I
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Condensed Ice, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption until the inflicted Cryo element is removed.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Mastery: Realm of Slumber II
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Condensed Ice, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption until the inflicted Cryo element is removed.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Mastery: Realm of Slumber III
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Condensed Ice, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption until the inflicted Cryo element is removed. Icicles will periodically fall from above, dealing Cryo DMG.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Mastery: Realm of Slumber IV
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Condensed Ice, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption until the inflicted Cryo element is removed. Icicles will periodically fall from above, dealing Cryo DMG.
